contest-event.event-date: Nov. 2, 1974 D National Mineworkers (Third Section) National Mineworkers (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-third-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Third Chorale and Variations [Lucas] Winter Gardens (Spanish Hall), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 10 bands competed. April 16, 2013, 3:35 p.m. July 16, 2016, 6:49 a.m. 1 Pontardulais Town Band Jeffrey Pearce 2 Whitworth & Spennymoor Silver Prize Band David Young 3 Grimethorpe Colliery Junior Band Barry Thompson 4 Greggs Bakery Band R.
